knimeNode.name: Export to MediaWiki
knimeNode.shortDescription: Exports the table to a MediaWiki format

fullDescription.intro:
Exports the table to a MediaWiki format in order to insert the result in a local mediawiki installation
mediawiki is the popular wiki platform used by Wikipedia. This node exports a Knime table to a tabular file formatted in the format defined by the mediawiki syntax. The user can copy and paste the file generated by this node to create a page in their laboratory wiki.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
